class.name: User_model
class.description: The user model is used to carry out database queries on the User table, Create and Read functionality so far

class.name: Skill_model
class.description: The skill model is used to carry out the database queries on the Skill table , most of the Read in CRUD has been implemented.

class.name: Pages
class.description: This Class extends the CI_controller and is used to display static pages in the site.

class.name: Users
class.description: Credit to Guide: CodeIgniter tutorial<https://www.codeigniter.com/userguide3/libraries/form_validation.html> Credit to Guide: Travesy media <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qS0a4nKQ6h8&index=6&list=PLillGF-RfqbaP_71rOyChhjeK1swokUIS> I have based my code on the approach used in the video ,implementing POST requests when registering to my api.

class.name: Skills
class.description: Credit to Guide: CodeIgniter tutorial <https://www.codeigniter.com/userguide3/tutorial/news_section.html> Credit to Guide: CodeIgniter RestApi tutorial <https://code.tutsplus.com/tutorials/working-with-restful-services-in-codeigniter--net-8814>

class.name: Format
class.description: Format class Help convert between various formats such as XML, JSON, CSV, etc.

class.name: REST_Controller
class.description: CodeIgniter Rest Controller A fully RESTful server implementation for CodeIgniter using one library, one config file and one controller.

class.name: Category
class.description: This class uses the Rest library which processes HTTP requests returning resources concerning Category queries resources in many formats such as JSON,csv,html,xml by adding optional format parameters to the http request.

class.description: This class uses the Rest library which processes HTTP requests returning resources concerning Trade queries in many formats such as JSON,csv,html,xml by adding optional format parameters to the http request.

class.description: This class uses the Rest library which processes HTTP requests returning resources concerning Profile queries in many formats such as JSON,csv,html,xml by adding optional format parameters to the http request.

class.name: User
